mapper.update:
update fs_supply_products
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
supply_prod_name = #{supplyProdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supply_prod_price = #{supplyProdPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supply_prod_num = #{supplyProdNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supply_prod_picture = #{supplyProdPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supply_prod_info = #{supplyProdInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
supply_prod_address = #{supplyProdAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supply_prod_state = #{supplyProdState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
effective_time = #{effectiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
expiration_time = #{expirationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR},
where supply_prod_id = #{supplyProdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update fs_supply_products set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, supply_prod_name = #{supplyProdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supply_prod_price = #{supplyProdPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supply_prod_num = #{supplyProdNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supply_prod_picture = #{supplyProdPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supply_prod_info = #{supplyProdInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, supply_prod_address = #{supplyProdAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supply_prod_state = #{supplyProdState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, effective_time = #{effectiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, expiration_time = #{expirationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR} where supply_prod_id = #{supplyProdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM fs_supply_products WHERE is_deleted = '0' AND supply_prod_state = '2'
SELECT count(supply_prod_id) FROM fs_supply_products WHERE is_deleted = '0'

SELECT
FROM fs_supply_products WHERE is_deleted = '0' AND supply_prod_state = '2' AND supply_prod_name LIKE "%"#{supplyProdCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
SELECT t.* FROM fs_supply_products t, fs_category c WHERE t.is_deleted = '0' AND t.supply_prod_state = '2' AND t.category_id = c.category_seq AND c.parent_id = '1' ORDER BY RAND( ) LIMIT 8
SELECT t.* FROM fs_supply_products t, fs_category c WHERE t.is_deleted = '0' AND t.supply_prod_state = '2' AND t.category_id = c.category_seq AND c.parent_id = '2' ORDER BY RAND( ) LIMIT 8
